title: what´s the font
content:
please can anybody tell me what is this font?

thanks

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20081007123720im_/http:/typophile.com/files/ab_rogers_1_5065.png)
author: angelito

comments.content: looks like a DIN to me.

Its not DIN, erm... Im unsure...  
Love to see a lowercase sample if you have one?

—  
Rez +

I am almost certain this is Alpha Headline by Cornel Windlin (of lineto.com).

[http://www.lineto.com/The+Designers/Cornel+Windlin/Fonts/](http://web.archive.org/web/20081007123720/http:/www.lineto.com/The+Designers/Cornel+Windlin/Fonts/ "http://www.lineto.com/The+Designers/Cornel+Windlin/Fonts/")

which, as i just realized, was licensed exclusively for Mitsubishi’s use until 2012.  
 [http://www.lineto.com/The+Fonts/Custom+Typefaces/Alpha+Headline/](http://web.archive.org/web/20081007123720/http:/www.lineto.com/The+Fonts/Custom+Typefaces/Alpha+Headline/ "http://www.lineto.com/The+Fonts/Custom+Typefaces/Alpha+Headline/")

Windlin’s Lutz seems to be a close neighbor if you are looking for something with the same feel  
 [http://www.lineto.com/The+Designers/Cornel+Windlin/Fonts/Lutz+Headline/](http://web.archive.org/web/20081007123720/http:/www.lineto.com/The+Designers/Cornel+Windlin/Fonts/Lutz+Headline/ "http://www.lineto.com/The+Designers/Cornel+Windlin/Fonts/Lutz+Headline/")
